snippet: Men and women who grew up as Coast Guard brats on the New York island have mixed feelings about the changing landscape of their former home base.
abstract: Men and women who grew up on Governors Island when it was an active base for the United States Coast Guard come together once again for their annual reunion; many have mixed feelings about the changing landscape and its current status as a destination for recreation and festivals.
lead_paragraph: Men and women who grew up as Coast Guard brats on the New York island have mixed feelings about the changing landscape of their former home base.

headline.seo: At Governors Island Reunion, Childhood Bonds Stand the Test of Time
headline.main: At Governors Island Reunion, Childhood Bonds Endure
headline.print_headline: At a Governors Island Reunion, Bonds Endure
